\section{Dokumentation der entwickelten ROS-Software}

\subsection{OSBK-Devices}
\label{\detokenize{osbk_devices:module-osbk_devices.sensor_base}}\label{\detokenize{osbk_devices:osbk-devices}}\label{\detokenize{osbk_devices::doc}}\index{osbk\_devices.sensor\_base (module)@\spxentry{osbk\_devices.sensor\_base}\spxextra{module}}\index{SensorBase (class in osbk\_devices.sensor\_base)@\spxentry{SensorBase}\spxextra{class in osbk\_devices.sensor\_base}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{osbk_devices:osbk_devices.sensor_base.SensorBase}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{class }}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{SensorBase}}}{\emph{name: str}, \emph{read\_interval: float}, \emph{msg\_interface: MsgType = OSBKFloatValue'}}{}
Abstract base class for sensor implementations.

Nodes that implement a specific sensor should inherit from this base class and overwrite the
\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{read\_sensor()}} function. This Class also inherits from Node.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{read\_interval}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{ROS parameter}}) \textendash{} ROS parameter to change the poll-rate for sensor readings

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{publish\_topic}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}) \textendash{} topic name, the sensors readings are published to,
defaults to \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{'{[}node\_name{]}/value'}} test

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{publish\_service\_name}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}) \textendash{} name of the service to publish sensor readings

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{msg\_interface}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{MsgType}}) \textendash{} the msg-interface this sensor uses to publish its
readings

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{publisher}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Publisher}}) \textendash{} ROS publisher for sending the readings

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{publish\_service}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Service}}) \textendash{} the service to request a publish of sensor readings

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{publish\_timer}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Timer}}) \textendash{} ROS timer to schedule publishing of sensor-readings

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}
\index{publish\_reading() (SensorBase method)@\spxentry{publish\_reading()}\spxextra{SensorBase method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{osbk_devices:osbk_devices.sensor_base.SensorBase.publish_reading}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{publish\_reading}}}{}{{ $\rightarrow$ None}}
Publish what \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{read\_sensor()}} returns.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Return type}] \leavevmode
None

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{read\_sensor() (SensorBase method)@\spxentry{read\_sensor()}\spxextra{SensorBase method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{osbk_devices:osbk_devices.sensor_base.SensorBase.read_sensor}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{read\_sensor}}}{}{{ $\rightarrow$ MsgType}}
Abstract method that returns a sensor reading.

This should be overridden for specific hardware implementation.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Returns}] \leavevmode
an instance of the MsgType specified in \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{self.msg\_interface}}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}


\end{fulllineitems}
\clearpage
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{osbk_devices:module-osbk_devices.actuator_base}}\index{osbk\_devices.actuator\_base (module)@\spxentry{osbk\_devices.actuator\_base}\spxextra{module}}\index{ActuatorBase (class in osbk\_devices.actuator\_base)@\spxentry{ActuatorBase}\spxextra{class in osbk\_devices.actuator\_base}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{osbk_devices:osbk_devices.actuator_base.ActuatorBase}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{class }}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{ActuatorBase}}}{\emph{name: str}, \emph{continuous: bool = True}, \emph{status\_poll\_interval: int = 1}}{}
Abstract base class for actuator implementations.

Nodes that implement a specific actuator should inherit from this base class and overwrite the
\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{set\_actuator()}} and \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{poll\_status()}} function. This class also inherits from Node.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{service\_name}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}) \textendash{} name of the service this actuator can be
controlled with

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{srv}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Service}}) \textendash{} the service registered with ROS, its callback function calls
set\_actuator()

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{poll\_timer}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Timer}}) \textendash{} the timer to trigger publishing of current status

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{publisher}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Publisher}}) \textendash{} a publisher to publish current actuator status periodically

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}
\index{poll\_status() (ActuatorBase method)@\spxentry{poll\_status()}\spxextra{ActuatorBase method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{osbk_devices:osbk_devices.actuator_base.ActuatorBase.poll_status}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{poll\_status}}}{}{{ $\rightarrow$ MsgType}}
Abstract method that should retrieves the current actuator status.

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{set\_actuator() (ActuatorBase method)@\spxentry{set\_actuator()}\spxextra{ActuatorBase method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{osbk_devices:osbk_devices.actuator_base.ActuatorBase.set_actuator}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{set\_actuator}}}{\emph{setpoint: SrvTypeRequest}}{{ $\rightarrow$ SrvTypeResponse}}
Abstract method that sets the actuator to a new setpoint.

This method should be overridden by specific hardware implementation.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{setpoint}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{SrvTypeRequest}}) \textendash{} the Request sent to self.srv

\item[{Returns}] \leavevmode
confirmation of the setpoint

\item[{Return type}] \leavevmode
SrvTypeResponse

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}


\end{fulllineitems}


\clearpage
\subsection{OSBK-Operation}
\label{\detokenize{osbk_operation:module-osbk_operation.actuator_state_machine}}\label{\detokenize{osbk_operation:osbk-operation}}\label{\detokenize{osbk_operation::doc}}\index{osbk\_operation.actuator\_state\_machine (module)@\spxentry{osbk\_operation.actuator\_state\_machine}\spxextra{module}}\index{ActuatorEntry (class in osbk\_operation.actuator\_state\_machine)@\spxentry{ActuatorEntry}\spxextra{class in osbk\_operation.actuator\_state\_machine}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{osbk_operation:osbk_operation.actuator_state_machine.ActuatorEntry}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{class }}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{ActuatorEntry}}}{\emph{name: str}, \emph{service\_name: str}, \emph{service\_type: SrvType}, \emph{topic\_name: str}, \emph{topic\_type: MsgType}}{}
A class that bundles the necessary information to control an actuator.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{name}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}) \textendash{} a name to identify this actuator

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{service\_name}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}) \textendash{} name of the service the actuator-node provides

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{service\_type}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{SrvType}}) \textendash{} the ROS-service-type used

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{topic\_name}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}) \textendash{} name of the topic on which the actuator-node publishes its status

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{topic\_type}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{MsgType}}) \textendash{} the ROS-message definition used

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{current\_state}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{SrvType}}) \textendash{} stores the last published message on the actuator-nodes topic

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{service}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Client}}) \textendash{} the service-client to command the actuator-node

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{topic}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Subscription}}) \textendash{} the subscription to listen to the actuator-nodes topic

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{ActuatorStateMachine (class in osbk\_operation.actuator\_state\_machine)@\spxentry{ActuatorStateMachine}\spxextra{class in osbk\_operation.actuator\_state\_machine}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{osbk_operation:osbk_operation.actuator_state_machine.ActuatorStateMachine}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{class }}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{ActuatorStateMachine}}}{\emph{name: str, states: List{[}State{]}, initial\_state: State, transitions: List{[}Transition{]}, actuators: List{[}ActuatorEntry{]}, update\_interval: int = 1}}{}
A node that manages multiple actuator-nodes according to a finite statemachine.

The statemachine is defined by a list of \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{State}}- and \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{Transition}}-objects. The 
actuator-setpoints defined in each state are sent to the according actuator in \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{actuators}}.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{states}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{List}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{[}}}{\hyperref[\detokenize{osbk_operation:osbk_operation.utility.State}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{State}}}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{]}}}) \textendash{} the states making up a statemachine

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{initial\_state}} ({\hyperref[\detokenize{osbk_operation:osbk_operation.utility.State}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{State}}}}}) \textendash{} the state to start statemachine-execution in

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{current\_state}} ({\hyperref[\detokenize{osbk_operation:osbk_operation.utility.State}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{State}}}}}) \textendash{} the state that is currently active

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{transitions}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{List}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{[}}}{\hyperref[\detokenize{osbk_operation:osbk_operation.utility.Transition}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Transition}}}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{]}}}) \textendash{} a list of transitions that connect the states of a statemachine

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{actuators}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{List}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{[}}}{\hyperref[\detokenize{osbk_operation:osbk_operation.actuator_state_machine.ActuatorEntry}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{ActuatorEntry}}}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{]}}}) \textendash{} a list of \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{ActuatorEntry}}-objects to interact with the actuator-nodes
controlled by this statemachine

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{update\_interval}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}) \textendash{} the interval in seconds with which the current state is checked for possible
transitions and the actuators receive commands

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{update\_timer}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Timer}}) \textendash{} the timer that triggers the update

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{osbk_operation:module-osbk_operation.utility}}\index{osbk\_operation.utility (module)@\spxentry{osbk\_operation.utility}\spxextra{module}}\index{State (class in osbk\_operation.utility)@\spxentry{State}\spxextra{class in osbk\_operation.utility}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{osbk_operation:osbk_operation.utility.State}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{class }}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{State}}}{\emph{name: str}, \emph{actuator\_states: dict}, \emph{final: bool = False}}{}
Represents a system-state as collection of actuator states.

Designed to be used in an object of the \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{ActuatorStateMachine}}-class.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{name}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}) \textendash{} a name for the state

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{actuator\_states}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{dict}}) \textendash{} a dictionary to map the names of \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{ActuatorEntry}}-objects to the
setpoint for the actuator

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{final}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bool}}) \textendash{} wether this state should be a finite one in the statemachine

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{possible\_transitions}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{List}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{[}}}{\hyperref[\detokenize{osbk_operation:osbk_operation.utility.Transition}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Transition}}}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{]}}}) \textendash{} a list of \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{Transition}}-objects which have this state as starting
state

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}
\index{check\_exit\_conditions() (State method)@\spxentry{check\_exit\_conditions()}\spxextra{State method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{osbk_operation:osbk_operation.utility.State.check_exit_conditions}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{check\_exit\_conditions}}}{}{{ $\rightarrow$ Transition}}
Return the first Transition with a satisfied condition.

\end{fulllineitems}


\end{fulllineitems}

\index{Transition (class in osbk\_operation.utility)@\spxentry{Transition}\spxextra{class in osbk\_operation.utility}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{osbk_operation:osbk_operation.utility.Transition}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{class }}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{Transition}}}{\emph{start: State}, \emph{end: State}, \emph{timed: bool = True}, \emph{time: int = 5000}, \emph{condition: Callable{[}{[}{]}}, \emph{bool{]} = \_default\_condition}, \emph{action: Callable{[}{[}{]}}, \emph{None{]} = \_default\_action}}{}
Represents a transition between two states.

Designed to be used in an \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{ActuatorStateMachine}}-object.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{start}} ({\hyperref[\detokenize{osbk_operation:osbk_operation.utility.State}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{State}}}}}) \textendash{} the starting state of this transition

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{end}} ({\hyperref[\detokenize{osbk_operation:osbk_operation.utility.State}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{State}}}}}) \textendash{} the state this transition leads to

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{timed}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bool}}) \textendash{} wether this Transition should be taken after a given time

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{time}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}) \textendash{} if \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{timed}} is true this controls the duration in seconds after which this
transition is triggered

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{timer}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Timer}}) \textendash{} the timer to trigger this transition. it should be created by an 
\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{ActuatorStateMachine}}-node

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{condition}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Callable}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{[}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{[}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{]}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bool}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{]}}}) \textendash{} a \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{Callable}}-object which should return True when the transition can be
taken

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{action}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Callable}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{[}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{[}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{]}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{None}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{]}}}) \textendash{} a \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{Callable}}-object which gets called when this transition gets taken

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{active}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bool}}) \textendash{} a boolean to activate or deactivate this transition

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}
\index{force\_take() (Transition method)@\spxentry{force\_take()}\spxextra{Transition method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{osbk_operation:osbk_operation.utility.Transition.force_take}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{force\_take}}}{}{{ $\rightarrow$ State}}
Take the transition without checking its condition.

Executes the \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{action}} and returns the end-state.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Returns}] \leavevmode
the state this transition leads to

\item[{Return type}] \leavevmode
{\hyperref[\detokenize{osbk_operation:osbk_operation.utility.State}]{\sphinxcrossref{State}}}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{take() (Transition method)@\spxentry{take()}\spxextra{Transition method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{osbk_operation:osbk_operation.utility.Transition.take}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{take}}}{}{{ $\rightarrow$ State}}
Take the transition if the condition is fulfilled.

Executes the \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{action}} and returns the end-state if \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{condition}} returns True.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Returns}] \leavevmode
the state this transition leads to or None

\item[{Return type}] \leavevmode
{\hyperref[\detokenize{osbk_operation:osbk_operation.utility.State}]{\sphinxcrossref{State}}}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}


\end{fulllineitems}


\clearpage
\subsection{Meso-Control-Package}
\label{\detokenize{meso_control_pkg:module-meso_control_pkg.meso_state_machine}}\label{\detokenize{meso_control_pkg:meso-control-package}}\label{\detokenize{meso_control_pkg::doc}}\index{meso\_control\_pkg.meso\_state\_machine (module)@\spxentry{meso\_control\_pkg.meso\_state\_machine}\spxextra{module}}\index{MesoStateMachine (class in meso\_control\_pkg.meso\_state\_machine)@\spxentry{MesoStateMachine}\spxextra{class in meso\_control\_pkg.meso\_state\_machine}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{meso_control_pkg:meso_control_pkg.meso_state_machine.MesoStateMachine}}\pysigline{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{class }}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{MesoStateMachine}}}
A node that implements the statemachine for controlling a mesocosm-tankpair.

This node extends the \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{ActuatorStateMachine}}-node.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{step\_publisher}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Publisher}}) \textendash{} publishes the current state-number

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{modbus\_write\_client}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Client}}) \textendash{} service-client to write the current state-number to the SPS via
the \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{ModbusTcpNode}}

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{change\_mode\_service}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Service}}) \textendash{} a service to change the operating mode (automatic cylce, measure
tank a, measure tank b, drain, stop) of this statemachine

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{current\_mode\_publisher}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Publisher}}) \textendash{} publishes the currently active operating mode

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{publish\_status\_timer}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Timer}}) \textendash{} the timer to trigger the publishing of the active operating mode

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{current\_mode}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}) \textendash{} a string to represent the currently active operating mode

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{last\_step\_number}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}) \textendash{} the index of the curently active state

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{meso_control_pkg:module-meso_control_pkg.tide_sim}}\index{meso\_control\_pkg.tide\_sim (module)@\spxentry{meso\_control\_pkg.tide\_sim}\spxextra{module}}\index{TideSim (class in meso\_control\_pkg.tide\_sim)@\spxentry{TideSim}\spxextra{class in meso\_control\_pkg.tide\_sim}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{meso_control_pkg:meso_control_pkg.tide_sim.TideSim}}\pysigline{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{class }}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{TideSim}}}
A node for controlling the tide platform based on real tide levels.

This node uses pegelonline.wsv.de to retrieve current tide levels at List (Sylt)
and sends a proportional height to the stepper-motor-control on the SPS.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{tide\_a\_client}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Client}}) \textendash{} interacts with the node controlling the tide-platform in tank A

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{tide\_b\_client}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Client}}) \textendash{} interacts with the node controlling the tide-platform in tank B

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{mode\_publisher\_a}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Publisher}}) \textendash{} publishes the currently active mode for tide control in
tank A (automatic or manual)

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{mode\_service\_a}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Service}}) \textendash{} can be used to set the mode for tide control in tank A

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{auto\_tide\_setting\_a}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bool}}) \textendash{} wether tide level in tank A is controlled automatically

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{mode\_publisher\_b}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Publisher}}) \textendash{} publishes the currently active mode for tide control in
tank B

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{mode\_service\_b}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Service}}) \textendash{} can be used to set the mode for tide control in tank B

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{auto\_tide\_setting\_b}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bool}}) \textendash{} wether tide level in tank B is controlled automatically

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{update\_timer}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Timer}}) \textendash{} triggers the update of the automatic tide control

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{mode\_publish\_timer}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Timer}}) \textendash{} triggers the publishing of the currently active modes

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}
\index{publish\_mode() (TideSim method)@\spxentry{publish\_mode()}\spxextra{TideSim method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{meso_control_pkg:meso_control_pkg.tide_sim.TideSim.publish_mode}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{publish\_mode}}}{}{}
Publish the current modes of tide-control in tank A and B.

\end{fulllineitems}

\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{meso_control_pkg:module-meso_control_pkg.sps_binary_actuator_node}}\index{meso\_control\_pkg.sps\_binary\_actuator\_node (module)@\spxentry{meso\_control\_pkg.sps\_binary\_actuator\_node}\spxextra{module}}\index{SpsBinaryActuator (class in meso\_control\_pkg.sps\_binary\_actuator\_node)@\spxentry{SpsBinaryActuator}\spxextra{class in meso\_control\_pkg.sps\_binary\_actuator\_node}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{meso_control_pkg:meso_control_pkg.sps_binary_actuator_node.SpsBinaryActuator}}\pysigline{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{class }}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{SpsBinaryActuator}}}
A node for a binary actuator controlled by an SPS, connected via Modbus.

Uses the \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{ModbusTcpNode}}.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{last\_state}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}) \textendash{} the last state received from the \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{ModbusTcpNode}}, either 0 or 1

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{modbus\_subscription}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Subscription}}) \textendash{} the subscriber listening to the \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{ModbusTcpNode}}

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{write\_client}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Client}}) \textendash{} the client for writing to the SPS via the \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{ModbusTcpNode}}

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}
\index{poll\_status() (SpsBinaryActuator method)@\spxentry{poll\_status()}\spxextra{SpsBinaryActuator method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}

\item[{Returns}] \leavevmode
a message object containing the actuator-state

\end{description}\end{quote}

\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{meso_control_pkg:module-meso_control_pkg.water_sensor_node}}\index{meso\_control\_pkg.water\_sensor\_node (module)@\spxentry{meso\_control\_pkg.water\_sensor\_node}\spxextra{module}}\index{WaterSensor (class in meso\_control\_pkg.water\_sensor\_node)@\spxentry{WaterSensor}\spxextra{class in meso\_control\_pkg.water\_sensor\_node}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{meso_control_pkg:meso_control_pkg.water_sensor_node.WaterSensor}}\pysigline{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{class }}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{WaterSensor}}}
Node for collecting and publishing the data from the water-sensor.

This node extends the \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{SensorBase}}-node and uses the \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{ModbusTcpNode}}.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{last\_reading}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{List}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{[}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{]}}}) \textendash{} last transmitted sensor-readings from the SPS.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{modbus\_subscriber}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Subscription}}) \textendash{} subscribes to the topic where the content of the SPS-feedback-values
are published

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}
\index{modbus\_handle() (WaterSensor method)@\spxentry{modbus\_handle()}\spxextra{WaterSensor method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{meso_control_pkg:meso_control_pkg.water_sensor_node.WaterSensor.modbus_handle}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{modbus\_handle}}}{\emph{msg: OSBKStringValue}}{}
Subscription-callback to store the transmitted sensor-values.

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{read\_sensor() (WaterSensor method)@\spxentry{read\_sensor()}\spxextra{WaterSensor method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{meso_control_pkg:meso_control_pkg.water_sensor_node.WaterSensor.read_sensor}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{read\_sensor}}}{}{}
Return the last sensor-reading as ROS-message to be published.

\end{fulllineitems}


\end{fulllineitems}

\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{meso_control_pkg:module-meso_control_pkg.modbus_tcp_node}}\index{meso\_control\_pkg.modbus\_tcp\_node (module)@\spxentry{meso\_control\_pkg.modbus\_tcp\_node}\spxextra{module}}\index{ModbusTcpNode (class in meso\_control\_pkg.modbus\_tcp\_node)@\spxentry{ModbusTcpNode}\spxextra{class in meso\_control\_pkg.modbus\_tcp\_node}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{meso_control_pkg:meso_control_pkg.modbus_tcp_node.ModbusTcpNode}}\pysigline{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{class }}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{ModbusTcpNode}}}
A node that implements the modbus communication to the SPS.

The feedback-registers are published as a JSON-formatted string.
The write-registers can be written individually via a service.

\end{fulllineitems}


\end{document}
